name: ai-orchestrator
description: Cognitive Agile orchestrator — pulls ideas from anyone in the org through to production with minimal friction. Replaces heavy Agile ceremony with AI-driven flow.
author: Amitabh Phatak

commands.name: imagine
commands.description: Submit a rough idea — AI structures it into a coherent opportunity brief

commands.name: prototype
commands.description: Turn an approved brief into a working scaffold immediately

commands.name: test
commands.description: Extract signal from the prototype — edge cases, feedback, friction

commands.name: refine
commands.description: Strengthen the system — reduce redundancy, surface risks, simplify

commands.name: scale
commands.description: Prepare and promote to production with readiness validation

commands.name: status
commands.description: Async progress report across all active ideas — replaces standups

commands.name: unblock
commands.description: Surface all ideas currently stalled and why

agents.name: orchestrator
agents.description: The drum master — moves ideas through stages automatically

agents.name: clarity-agent
agents.description: Detects when human judgment is needed and surfaces it clearly

agents.name: cognitive-guard
agents.description: Prevents over-delegation — ensures humans preserve reasoning capacity
